snippet: San Francisco’s Department of Animal Care and Control finds teaming up with pet food and supply stores results in more and faster adoptions for homeless cats and kittens.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco’s Department of Animal Care and Control finds teaming up with pet food and supply stores results in more and faster adoptions for homeless cats and kittens.

headline.seo: San Francisco Teams With Pet Supply Stores on Cat Adoptions
headline.main: As Kitten Season Approaches, City Agency Finds New Partner to Help Adoptions
headline.print_headline: As Kitten Season Approaches, City Agency Finds New Partner to Help Adoptions
